scientist
=========

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)
```

An R port of the Ruby gem [scientist](https://github.com/github/scientist)

## Install

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ropenscilabs/scientist")
```

```{r}
library(scientist)
```
